He left for the Dan Palace.

source_sentence: 路取西涼沙磧伊西烏耆疎勒望于天竺。
translation: His path took him to Śāriputra, Isi, Wuqi, and Potala, hoping to reach India.
He then traveled further west and gradually reached the end of his journey.

source_sentence: 至式匿國之乏騾嶺吉運鎮城。
translation: He reached the town of Giryun in the Varuṇa Mountains of India.
He encountered a bandit in the country who was unable to advance.
They rode back into the city of Tobler.
He turned southeast and traveled 800 miles.
He went to the country of Khotan and stayed at the Golden Wheel Temple.

source_sentence: 化利有緣一歲有餘道俗瞻覲。
translation: For a year or so, he was visited by religious and lay people for the benefit of those who had a purpose.
It was then that he gradually became tangled up in a disease.
Without any medicine or stones, he was readmitted and transformed.
He was 91 years old in spring and autumn.
He had a Dharma summer of 72 years.

source_sentence: 以天寶二年歲次癸未十一月二十三日卒於此寺矣。
translation: He died at this temple on the 23rd day of the 11th month, during the second year of Tianbao's reign.

source_sentence: 時本道節度副使大夫蒙零詧監護葬儀。
translation: At the time, Dafu Mengzhong, a deputy envoy of the native provinces, supervised the funeral ceremony.

source_sentence: 弟子比丘利言等銜哀啜泣。
translation: The disciples, monks, lions, and others expressed their sympathy and wept.

source_sentence: 擗慄茹茶燒香散花茶毘起塔所譯經法不及入開元目錄。
translation: They rushed to the restaurant, burned incense, scattered flowers, and raised the stūpa. The sūtras and teachings they translated didn't make it into the Kaiyuan Catalogue.

source_sentence: 准勅編入貞元新定釋教目錄。
translation: We compiled them into the Zhenyuan Revised List of Canonical Buddhist Texts.

source_sentence: 開元釋教錄二十卷(上帙總錄下帙別錄十八年庚午於西崇福寺塔院撰)續大唐內典錄一卷(同前十八年撰)續古今譯經圖記一卷(同前十八年撰)續集古今佛道論一卷(同前)集諸經禮懺儀二卷(同前)右上五部二十五卷智昇所撰。
translation: The Kaiyuan Catalogue of the Teaching of the Śākyas is a twenty-fascicle work (the first book is a general catalogue, the second book is a separate catalogue compiled at the west Shōfukuji stūpa in the 18th year of the Gengwu period), the sequential Catalogue of the Great Tang Canon (compiled in the 18 previous years), the sequential Illustrated Record of Translated Scriptures Past and Present (compiled in the 18 previous years), the sequential Collection of Ancient and Modern Treatises on the Buddha Way (compiled in the 18 previous years), and the Collection of Ritual and Repentance Rituals (compiled in the 2 previous years).
He had long been a follower of the Śākyas and wished to promote the great teaching.
But he had little ability and little power to fulfill his original intention.
He had to go through many winters and summers while exhorting others.

source_sentence: 曾未能宣傳正法荷擔菩提。
translation: He had never been able to promote the true teaching and bear the burden of enlightenment.
But recently, he read the Tripiṭaka and explored the many records.
He saw that there were some discrepancies or errors that were not yet settled.
He was crazy enough to write this record.

source_sentence: 雖文詞靡敘而事有所憑。
translation: Although the text is incomplete and the facts have some basis, my views have not yet been broadened.

source_sentence: 但鄙見未弘固多疎闕耳。
translation: However, my humble views have not yet been broadened, and there are certainly many gaps.

source_sentence: 其續內典錄等附於本部之末。
translation: The continuation of these records is appended to the end of this part.
It's fortunate that the incoming scholars won't be cynical.
